greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of a number triangle related to the Pell numbers.
comment: Row sums of A110330. Results from a general construction: the row sums of the inverse of the number triangle whose columns have e.g.f. (x^k/k!)/(1-a*x-b*x^2) have g.f. (1-(a+2)x-(2b-a-1)x^2)/(1-x)^3 and general term 1+(b-a)*n-b*n^2. This is the binomial transform of (1,-a,-2b,0,0,0,...).
Hankel transform of A007054(n)-2*0^n. - _Paul Barry_, Jul 20 2008
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
xref: Cf. A028387 (absolute values). A165900 is another version.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 20 2005
